column4: Hey people, I've an issue with a .lng file with opera @ feisty
Oh... well, sometimes Opera crashes when I go to certain sites
I guess it's because of the language file. Is that possible?
I use 9.50b and the language file is from the 9.26 version
do you get anything in /var/log/messages or /var/log/kern.log to suggest what might have hapened?
there is nothing related to Opera in the logs
